your bor marker and one marker under each underarm ** increase round *k to 1 st before sm m1r k1 sl sm k1 m1l* repeat from * to * one more time k to bor marker 4 st increased work 5 6 6 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 rounds of stockinette without decreases ** repeat from ** to ** another four times you should now have a total of 128 146 164 182 200 218 236 254 272 290 st on your needles work another 3 1 1 0 0 0 1 1 1 3 rounds or until you reach 1 in 2 5 cm before your preferred length switch to your us size 7 4 5 mm needles work 1 in 2 5 cm of 1x1 rib k1 p1 cast off using italian bind-off or your preferred stretchy bind off method collar you will now work the collar of the sweater carefully undo the provisional cast on edge and place the stitches on your us size 7 4 5 mm or smaller needles you should have 152 168 178 190 204 216 228 240 252 268 stitches on your needles with rs facing join in new yarn and place bor marker the ws of the collar will be shown when worn work
